start_message: Hello! I am Rutor Bot. Choose an action from the menu:
help_text:
ğŸ¤– *Rutor Bot Help*

*/search <text>* - Find and download torrent
*/add_search <text>* - Subscribe to search (new torrents)
*/list_search* - List your saved searches
*/list_subscriptions* - List your series subscriptions
*/list* - List active torrents in client
*/language* - Change language

Just use the menu buttons for lists.
unknown_command: Sorry, I did not understand this command. Use the menu or /start
invalid_format:
Invalid format. Must be: /add_search <url> <minute> <hour> <day> <month> <day_of_week>
Example: /add_search http://rutor.info/search/0/0/100/0/matrix * * * * *
search_added:
âœ… Search added with ID {search_id}

Now you can:
/subscribe_{search_id} - Subscribe to notifications
/es_{search_id} - Execute search now
every_month: On day {day} of every month at {hour}:{minute}
